title: Chicago White Sox revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2002 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 269.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 106.0 was reached at Year 2002
